## Install

TODO req etc..

``` sh
pip install heatgeo
```

### How to use

The directory `experiments` contains code to reproduce our main results.
We used `hydra`, the parameters can be changed in `config` or directly
in the CLI. In `notebooks`, we provide examples on toy datasets.
